attributes.additional_details:
At the ages of 15, 16 and 17 we are all still children, however we get charged an adult fare on trains and buses. Anyone who is still a full time student when they are under 18 should not only receive a "discount" they should only be charged a child fare!

We cannot work and we do not get free transport to school or collage so we should not have to pay the same price as an adult who works full time.
